page.title: 15The Water Works
page.content: Mrs.Z looked after the Water Works,which was by the side of her house.The Water Works belongs to the Severn Trent Water Authority.She was originally from Australia and has been living in Stony Houghton for thirty years.She came over here because her daughter and grandchildren live in Stony Houghton.She owns a dog.Mrs.Z showed us around the Water Works.She told us that the water came from Budby and that no other workers had worked at the Water Works for about twenty years.She showed us the machines and large water pipes.Then we had to go, so we thanked her.She said good_bye,and that she had enjoyed our company.
